DataElement.preferredName: Patient Angle Closure Glaucoma Present Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator related to the patient having a sudden increase of intraocular pressure, resulting in pain and an abrupt decrease in visual acuity.
